meanings.definition: The process of reproducing graphic material, especially by photocopying.
meanings.sent1: Reprographies help make copies of important documents.
meanings.sent2: The office relies on reprographies to duplicate papers efficiently.
meanings.sent3: When the photocopier broke, they had to resort to manual reprographies.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a reprographies machine, duplicating memories effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The reprographies of the painting captured every detail perfectly.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of reproducing graphic material, especially by photocopying.
meanings.sent1: She found a job in the reprographies sector, operating copy machines.
meanings.sent2: The reprographies business boomed with the demand for document duplication.
meanings.sent3: The reprographies company had a copycat competitor trying to steal their clients.
meanings.sent4: In the reprographies world, speed and accuracy are key to success.
meanings.sent5: His passion for reprographies led him to open his own printing shop.
